title: Preview-zh
summary:
Preview ServerThis is a preview server for web page development. It will enable any one LAN device to access the Web page you write. This makes testing device compatibility easier.  How to useIf you run it without any arguments,  it will run on port 80 and on its own path. Like this python server.pyYou can also use command-line arguments to specify which port and path to run. For example: xxxxxxxxxxpython Server.py --port=8000 --path=D:\Documents Why to useWhy use the preview server instead of "http.server"? ContrastPreviewhttp.serverindex.htmlSupportSupportContent-TypeSupportNoNon-ASCII PathSupportNo 中文： 这个是一个为页面开发提供预览功能的Server。它能让同一局域网内任意设备访问到你所编写的网页。这将使得测试设备兼容性十分容易。 如何使用如果你不带任何参数的运行它，它将监听80端口并运行在脚本所在的路径中。就像这样python server.py你也可以使用命令行参数来指定监听的端口和运行路径。样例: xxxxxxxxxxpython Server.py --port=8000 --path=D:\Documents 为什么选择Preview为什么使用Preview而不是"http.server"？ 对比Previewhttp.server"/"解析到"index.html"支持支持响应头拥有: Content-Type支持不非ASCII编码路径名/文件名支持不
